item.description:
We have posted information on a 5K run for October 4th in Braintree. (Forget Me Not 5K Road Race, Benefiting Alzheimer's Disease) http://www.runnerswor...

To get everyone ready for a 5K, event we will be posting training events using the "Couch to 5K" training schedule.

http://www.coolrunnin...

This week we are starting from scratch from week 1. Remember to bring your sneakers and some water!

If this time is too early/late for you and you would like to train please note it in your RSVP so we may note your feedback for scheduling future training sessions.

Wednesday, July 15th
6:30pm
Braintree High School
Track

Fee: Annual Members - FREE, Members and Guests - $2 per person

Organizer(s): Julie & Amanda

Min/Max: At least 6 Yes RSVPs by 12pm/Noon on Wednesday, July 15th Attendance is unlimited.

Guests: Welcome!

RSVP Deadline: Please finalize your RSVP by NOON on Wednesday, July 15th.

Inclement Weather: Heavy rains will cancel. We will train if it is overcast or there is a slight drizzle. Please plan to bring a lightweight jacket with a hood just in case. (We will do my best to notify everyone if this event is cancelled by 2pm on the day of the training.)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Directions: Please see “Directions to Frequently Used Venues” Discussion Thread on the Message Board. You may click on the following link. http://fitness.meetup...
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet by the track.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Training for 5K, Week 1
